name: edu.umn.cs.ivlab.minvr3.xritoolkit
description: MinVR3 Plugin Unity Package that supports using MinVR3 together with Unity's XR Interaction Toolkit

samples.displayName: MinVR3 with Unity XR Interaction Toolkit
samples.description: Two menus are displayed in the same scene, one created with MinVR3, the other with a Unity Canvas.  Shows how to combine MinVR interfaces with interfaces from Unity's XR Interaction Toolkit, which include support for interacting with Unity Canvases with XR Controllers.
